projects.name: Student Records Management System
projects.description: Implemented a character user interface with the objective to produce a single records management portal for both students and teachers. Ensured a user friendly and interactive interface for seamless user experience.

projects.name: Student Campus Website
projects.description: An interactive website made with the objective of optimizing the student life by being a singular platform for all the student needs. The site features contacts and menus of all the local food outlets, cab sharing services, resource library for assignments and study material along with various ongoing projects.

projects.name: Sign Language Detection and Translation using YOLO
projects.description: Implemented a computer vision program which inputs real time frames from any input camera, detects the hand signs and renders it onto the display screen. The project utilises a custom, preprocessed dataset for training and testing and utlises the YOLOv5 real time object detection algorithm.
